name: Speed of Sound
description:
You and a friend have been invited to join the Speed of Sound parkour racing organization in the duo league. Holding only the world’s best parkour racers, this league sees them compete in beautiful locations across the world to prove who’s the fastest. Your goal is to rise through the ranks of the league’s 3 divisions (The Racecar Division, The Jet Division, The Rocket Division), to be able to make the Sound Championships and prove both of you are the fastest of them all. Are you up to the challenge?

Speed of Sound is a two player action parkour game where you and a friend must race through various levels as fast as possible to try and become champions.

Features-
  • 10 levels to go as fast as possible in
  • Online two-player play
  • A progression system through 3 divisions and a championship
  • Hidden collectables and bonus content
  • Difficulty options to vary your game length

Note - Speed of Sound requires a persistent online connection whilst playing.
